entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow in outlying areas this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow in outlying areas early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
